name: Millium, Voice of a New Generation
text:
When this card enters your field ⇒ Put the top card of your magic stone deck into your field.
You may pay the attribute cost of Fairy Tale resonators with light will.
Whenever this card attacks or blocks ⇒ Force 1 (Roll a die.) Put X [+100/+100] counters on this card, where X is the result of the roll.
